name: Adam Gierscher
body:
# Under Construction
Hi whomever is viewing this page.  Currently I am in the process of making a nice pretty completely made by me HTML 5 webpage, but until then this will have to do.  So please bear with me.

## About Me
I am a University of Waterloo student studying computer programming.  Ever since I started programming in grade nine I was hooked.  Something about being able to see a creation of mine come to life and do what I want I just find amazing.

## Education
I am enrolled at the University of Waterloo in Honours Mathematics, but will be switching to Computer Science soon.  I chose this path, because for the first 1.5 years they are identical courses, but math is half the price.  So I was always in it for the computers.  As part of my education thus far I have taken and completed Algebra, Linear Algebra, Calculus (parts one and two), and Computer Science (parts one and two).  I have also taken as electives both Microeconomics and Macroeconomics, Physics, and German.

## Computer Programming Skills
* Web Development
  * HTML
  * CSS
  * JS
* Server Side
  * PHP
* Scripting
  * Python 2.7
* Native Code
  * C
  * C++ -> I am in the process of learning this right now
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
